question_text: What is the biggest risk associated with relying entirely on a SaaS provider for business-critical services?
answer_options: You may need to update your own operating system
You lose the ability to scale the app to your needs
Your data and application availability depend entirely on the provider
You must hire developers to maintain the software
correct_answer: Your data and application availability depend entirely on the provider
explanation: If the SaaS provider goes offline or experiences data loss, customers typically cannot intervene directly to restore service.
